participant_1.background:
I love mushroom ravioli and I'm getting married soon!
I live in a small home and love my collection of comic books.
I'm looking for a home with a large room to build my models in.
i work part time.
I work out vigorously to keep in shape and avoid eating vegetables that I dislike, which my parents are unaware of.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud of my work as an upholsterer and the commissions I've received from comic book artists.
I am a healthy person, except for my love of milk.
my father was a cook.
through them i have learned to make up myself and others.
I was a librarian, but I lost my job because I was always forgetting where I put things.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I am an upholsterer, and I am quite proud of my work. I have received many commissions from comic book artists.
That sounds really cool! I wish I had some artistic talent.
You can always learn! One of my best friends is an artist who taught herself how to draw.
I'm not sure I have the patience for that.
Well, I'm sure you're good at something. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read and collect comic books. I'm also getting married soon, and I'm looking for a house with a large room to build my models in.
That's great! I'm happy for you. I'm sure you'll find a great house.
Thanks! And congrats on your work as an upholsterer.
Thanks! It's been a lot of hard work, but it's been worth it.
I'm sure it has. I'm glad you're so passionate about it.
